cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)
project(gnulib VERSION 0.0.0 LANGUAGES C)
add_library(gnulib OBJECT lib/af_alg.c
lib/asnprintf.c
lib/asprintf.c
lib/basename-lgpl.c
lib/calloc.c
lib/cloexec.c
lib/close.c
lib/dup2.c
lib/error.c
lib/exitfail.c
lib/fcntl.c
lib/fd-hook.c
lib/fflush.c
lib/fileblocks.c
lib/float.c
lib/fpurge.c
lib/freading.c
lib/free.c
lib/fseek.c
lib/fseeko.c
lib/fstat.c
lib/ftell.c
lib/ftello.c
lib/full-read.c
lib/full-write.c
lib/getdtablesize.c
lib/getprogname.c
lib/ialloc.c
lib/itold.c
lib/lseek.c
lib/malloc.c
lib/malloca.c
lib/memchr.c
lib/open.c
lib/printf-args.c
lib/printf-parse.c
lib/raise.c
lib/read.c
lib/realloc.c
lib/reallocarray.c
lib/safe-alloc.c
lib/safe-read.c
lib/safe-write.c
lib/stat-time.c
lib/stat-w32.c
lib/stat.c
lib/stdio-read.c
lib/stdio-write.c
lib/strerror-override.c
lib/strerror.c
lib/sys_socket.c
lib/unistd.c
lib/vasnprintf.c
lib/vasprintf.c
lib/write.c
lib/xalloc-die.c
lib/xasprintf.c
lib/xmalloc.c
lib/xsize.c
lib/xvasprintf.c)
target_include_directories(gnulib PUBLIC . lib)
